channel.title: [562] People cant connect. Need major help, and a few questions
channel.description:
Okay, so recently, i downloaded a 562 server. Here is teh link to the server download http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,449382.0.html in teh client.java, i changed the ip to my ip, using cmd (windows command) in cmd, typed ipconfig and got my ip. Now, i tried, and I connected to my server. So i uploaded teh client, and when my friend downloaded it, it didnt work. Now Is theer anythign i need to change in teh client, besides client .java? And now for teh source: i cant find if you have to change the ip, beacause i cant find and ip spot.
in my source there are serveral folders. Bin(contains all the .class files) Compilers etc. data Deps docs dumper lists random src ~~end of folders, now files.
compile, run, hs_err_pid1176.log, hs_err_pid1192.log, hs_err_pid2808.log, hs_err_pid4428.log, hs_err_pid4640.log, hs_err_pid1192.log, hs_err_pid5032.log
Can someone PLEASe give detailed explanations o nwhat to change, or how to make it online, plus, how can i make myself staff? thx alot!

in teh client.java, i changed the ip to my ip, using cmd (windows command) in cmd, typed ipconfig and got my ip.
